1:
/start: activate Bot
/stop: deactivate Bot
/status: show if Bot is active
/list: List of your Pokemon and Types
/add <PokedexID> [IV]: add a Pokemon to your list. IV is not necessary, default 0.
/del <PokedexID>: delete a Pokemon from your list
/setiv <PokedexID> <IV>: set the min IV% for a Pokmeon
/mydata: shows your stored userdata
/deleteall: delete all your information and Lists (not recoverable)

INFO:If IV = -1, Pokemon without IV are also reported.
7: Please give me a PokedexId after
14: Please give me a PokedexId and IV after /setiv
19: Your ChatID was blockt by the Administrator
20: All your Data was deleted. Bye
